text: Doy næ nx nxallxhˌ thrng pordpran tx brrda phu sraththa khna thi phwk khea hısatyaban kæ cea tı tnmi (thi huda y bi yahˌ) pheraa phraxngkh thrng rxbru di thung sing thi mi xyu nı citcı khxng phwk khea phraxngkh cung di thrng prathan khwam sngb cı lng mab nph wk khea læa di thrng txbthæn hı kæ phwk khea sung chaychna xan kıl ni
